DOC.brief_summary: This study compare 14-day bronchodilator efficacy indacaterol placebo salmeterol .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Different Doses Indacaterol Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Diagnosis chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) ( moderatetosevere classify Global Initiative Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease [ GOLD ] Guidelines , 2008 ) : 1 . Smoking history least 10 packyears 2 . Postbronchodilator force expiratory volume 1 second ( FEV1 ) < 80 % â‰¥ 30 % predict normal value 3 . Postbronchodilator FEV1/FVC ( force vital capacity ) < 70 % Exclusion criterion : Patients COPD exacerbation require systemic corticosteroid and/or antibiotic and/or hospitalization 6 week prior screen Patients respiratory tract infection within 6 week prior screen Patients concomitant pulmonary disease Patients history asthma Patients diabetes Type I uncontrolled diabetes Type II Any patient lung cancer history lung cancer Patients history certain cardiovascular comorbid condition Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion apply study .
